```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ChessCap)
library(ggplot2)


#create boxplots winner vs number of turns
ggplot(chess.small, aes(x=winner, y=turns)) +
  geom_boxplot(fill='steelblue') +
  labs(title = 'Winner by Number of Turns')
```
